name: Story of a Nomad
description:
Want to try it out?

PC and Mac - Early Access right now for £5. Free updates forever.

Please remember, this game is by no means finished. There may be bugs, there may be issues, I will endeavour to fix each and every one of them along with improving the game for as long as possible.

If you have any issues, please get in touch with me via danny@redbeardinteractive.co.uk.

Thank you again,

Danny

What is Story of a Nomad?

There wasn't an apocolypse, the world hasn't ended. You wanted to get away from everything and make your own life in the wild, you just didn't know how hard it would be.

A survival exploration game by Danny Goodayle set in the present day.

  • Crafting / Scavenging
  • Building
  • Procedurally generated worlds
  • Weather and Temperature systems
Live, continuous development

Come and see how games are made!

We put a lot of effort into our games, we want you to know how much we care about them too. So we are live-streaming, every thursday, on twitch with full access to the team. Nothing will be hidden or done "off-screen", Code, Art and even design are live-streamed to our viewers.

The plan is to release a first-playable-prototype on Thursday, March 10th for £5 for the first few feature sets until we feel Story of a Nomad has reached an early alpha. All funds will be reinvested towards the developing Story of a Nomad further.
